summary.Diagnosis: Chronic Schizophrenia (Paranoid), DM (Diabetes Mellitus) - HTN (Hypertension), Hypercholesterolemia (Triglycerides), Paranoid Delusions, ADHD
summary.Treatment: Counselled over Phone. Medications: Tab ZODON Plus (1 morning, 1 night), Tab Qubipin 200mg (1 night), Tab ATIVAN (Lorazepam) 2mg (1 night), Tab Rivotril 0.5mg (Clonazepam) (1 night), Tab SERTA 50mg (1 night). Continue other B.P. & Sugar medicines.
summary.Follow-up: Call if any problem. Prescription validity: 3 months. In emergency, admit at Asha Hospital.
